attributes.action: The House of Lords to be dissolved replaced with directly elected house
attributes.additional_details: To put foreign citizens before the rights of UK citizens is to act in a treasonous way. New House to be elected on proportional basis with no political appointees. House to elect its leader from elected members. No political wip or pressure to be accepted
attributes.background: Due to the House of Lords voting for citizens of the EU to be given right to stay but not linking it with British citizens right to stay in the EU they have acted for a foreign power over and before British citizens.
